name: 11ty-tai11base
description: A base 11ty starter: Take @danfascia/11ty-base + TailwindCSS + PurgeCSS + CSS minify
author: danfascia

scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=dev && rm -rf dist && tailwind build ./src/styles/styles.css -o ./dist/styles.css && eleventy --serve
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf dist && eleventy && tailwind build ./src/styles/styles.css -o ./dist/styles.css && postcss ./dist/styles.css -o ./dist/styles.css
